valid.projectIdInvalid: Project ID must start with a lowercase letter and can only support lowercase letter, number and _, maximum of 127 characters
valid.saveFirst: Please click save button to save project ID first.

create.inputName: Please input a name for your project
create.projectNameAlert: Your project's globally unique identifier, used in your database as database name. You cannot change your project ID after project creation.
create.inputEmail: Please the email address(es) to received notifications from this project
create.inputEmailAlert: Use column to seperate the emails if you want to add multiple email addresses
create.inputEnv: Please specify the environment type for your project
create.inputEnvAlert: This setting customizes your project for different stages of the app lifecycle. Tagging your project as an environment type has no effect on how your project works or its features. However, the tagging can help you and your team manage your various projects for the app lifecycle.
